results.name: Derangement numbers d(n,4) where d(n,k) = k(n-1)(d(n-1,k) + d(n-2,k)), with d(0,k) = 1 and d(1,k) = 0.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: Inverse binomial transform of A007696. E.g.f.: exp(-x)/(1-4*x)^(1/4). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Dec 17 2003
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 02 2003
